Mongo comp opers:
$eq    
$ne 
$gt 
$gte    
$lt 
$lte 
$in 
$nin    


ORDS:
   "$eq" : string | number | date
   "$ne" : string | number | date
   "$lt" :  number | date
   "$lte" : number | date
   "$gt" : number | date
   "$gte" : number | date   
   "$instr" : string 
   "$ninstr" : string
   "$like" : string
   "$null" : null
   "$notnull" : null
   "$between" : betweenValue

To do:
   "$between" : betweenValue
  $in
  $notin
  $matchregexp

   proper date support

  $inthenext (seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years)
  $notinthenext
  $inthelast
  $tnotinthelast


ORDS wins
   "$instr" : string 
   "$ninstr" : string
   "$like" : string
   "$null" : null
   "$notnull" : null

Mongo wins
$in 
$nin    

supported:
eq
ne
lt
lte
gt
gte
